708910.name: Hordiaz
708910.description:
After the death of your child, you decided to leave his hometown to make a new life in a small village, in the travel your cart is stolen and you need to start your life empty-handed.


Key features:



  • Progress your character taking care of your 7 needs:hunger, thirst, toilet, hygiene, sleep, happiness and health.
  • Crafting mechanics
  • Shop System.
  • Bank System.
  • Quest System.
  • Mining and refining of ores.
  • Food cooking.
  • World day-night cycle.

    Future features:



  • 5 more races to play: dwarf, white elf, Shadow elf, demon, undead.
  • 1 new scourge village to upgrade.
  • FriendShip System.
  • Farms plots around the world to grow your crops.
  • Ranged combat with bows and magic staffs.
  • New lands to explore with biomes snow and desert.
  • Housing.
  • Gods to worship for each race with unique buffs.
  • More to come!
